mapper.select: select pro_name,pro_tagprice,color,pro_number from product order by pro_number desc
select typesid,pro_name,pro_tagprice,color,pro_number from product where typesid=#{typesid} order by pro_number desc
select pro_name,pro_tagprice,color,pro_number,rownum from (select * from product order by pro_number desc ) where rownum <7
select count(*) from product where pro_tagprice between ${lowPrice} and ${highPrice}
select count(*) from product where pro_name like '%${searchName}%'
select pro_name,pro_tagprice,color,pro_number,pro_img,pro_price from product order by pro_number desc
select * from product p , typesinfo t where p.typesid=t.typesid order by p.pro_number desc
mapper.update: update product set registerflag=1 where pro_number=#{pro_number}
